attrs.title: $nuxt: The NuxtJS helper
attrs.description: $nuxt is an helper focused to improve the user experience of your users.

body:
$nuxtis an helper focused to improve the user experience of your users.

  • isOffline
    • Type: Boolean
    • Description: true when the user internet connection becomes offline
  • isOnline
    • Type: Boolean
    • Description: Opposite of isOffline

Example:

layouts/default.vue:

<template>
  <div>
    <div v-if="$nuxt.isOffline">You are offline</div>
    <nuxt/>
  </div>
</template>
